# Password

Password configuration for a user.

| Characteristic | Value  |
| -------------- | ------ |
| Type           | `enum` |

## Variants

### \[DEFAULT\] Locked Password

Lock the user's password. (equivalent to `passwd -l`)

| Characteristic | Value    |
| -------------- | -------- |
| Type           | `object` |

### Properties

#### `mode` **<span style="color:orange;">(required)</span>**

| Characteristic | Value    |
| -------------- | -------- |
| Type           | `string` |
| Value          | `locked` |
